entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
